H0.text: Which Greek God gave Cassandra the give of prophecy. Zeus

H1.text: Which Greek God gave Cassandra the give of prophecy. Poseidon

H2.text: Which Greek God gave Cassandra the give of prophecy. Athena

H3.text: Which Greek God gave Cassandra the give of prophecy. APOLLO

A4.text: Apollo fulfilled her wish, but she went back on her word and rejected him soon after.

A5.text: Apollo granted Cassandra the gift of prophecy
